Explain here some stuff with MarkDown. Letâ€™s create some numbers:

.. code:: ipython3

    import numpy as np

.. code:: ipython3

    a = np.linspace(0,1,10)
    print(a)


.. code-block:: text

    [0.         0.11111111 0.22222222 0.33333333 0.44444444 0.55555556
     0.66666667 0.77777778 0.88888889 1.        ]


That was it!
